alert.note: Alert for Independence; Izard; Jackson; Lawrence (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Independence, southeastern Randolph, east central Izard, northeastern Jackson, Lawrence and southern Sharp Counties through 745 AM CDT... At 659 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cave City, or 17 miles west of Lake Charles State Park, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walnut Ridge... Hoxie... Black Rock... Lake Charles State Park... Cave City... Swifton... College City... Portia... Strawberry... Lynn... O`Kean... Sidney... Alicia... Minturn... Annieville... Evening Shade... Sedgwick... Smithville... Powhatan... Aetna... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
